**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-07T22:20:11Z" title="06/07/2015 10:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 7, 2015</time> by mythbusters844**

15 rep comments for that pic, too. Tut tut.

From v0.23.5 ... after a catastrophic failure at launch, all that remained was the capsule sitting atop a Launch Stability Enhancer.....

![screenshot164.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-avnjOpphLn0/U-AYGQuMkwI/AAAAAAAAESk/6RW2JJ6LNJM/s800/screenshot164.png)

On the subject of heroically walking away from an explosion...

![screenshot314.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-s3eK-_2qOp0/VPlNjpIvU0I/AAAAAAAABV0/K6eBVbmISs8/s800/screenshot314.png)

(I pressed SPACE to disconnect from the final orbital insertion stage, which still had a little fuel left in it. I forgot that I still had throttle set to nonzero, so the main ship's engines activated, damaging the previous stage's fuel tanks. I quickly mashed X to turn them off, but it was too late; the chain reaction explosion had already begun. Without really thinking about it, I immediately mashed Z to set throttle to full (and, also without really thinking about it, F2 to grab a screenshot) and successfully outran the explosion.

This old attempt at a Mun Colony....

[![screenshot12.png](http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot12.png)](http://s83.photobucket.com/user/Goof112/media/screenshot12.png.html)

And this almost-successful landing on Tylo.

[![screenshot17.png](http://i83.photobucket.com/albums/j314/Goof112/screenshot17.png)](http://s83.photobucket.com/user/Goof112/media/screenshot17.png.html)

My funniest picture is probably... not safe for work. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) So I'm just going to [link to it here](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44754370/screenshot35.png) with a parental advisory warning...

No, I don't remember what I was thinking. It probably involved needing only a very small amount of dV and thrust in that second stage. When I was happy with the results, I went and closed the fairing that had been left open until that point and... well, the rest is history.

An industrial accident while building the Duna kethane refinery:

[![17981023404_dd3d753021_z.jpg](https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/387/17981023404_dd3d753021_z.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/toVrNU)

The classic Kerbal publicity photo for the establishment of a new base on a distant world:

[![17983252673_03f246b91c_z.jpg](https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8856/17983252673_03f246b91c_z.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/tp7Suz)

One of the "witty loading hints" tells you to point the correct end towards space. This is perhaps the most important tip in the whole game.

[![18416159798_47f3aa008b_q.jpg](https://c1.staticflickr.com/1/404/18416159798_47f3aa008b_q.jpg)](https://flic.kr/p/u4nCGw)

THIS IS THE ONE I WAS LOOKING FOR! Oh it's perfect! (Not mine, posted by Jonbar [HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99924-This-Will-Not-End-Well-%28post-images-of-your-craft-in-a-precarious-situation%29?p=1754104&viewfull=1#post1754104))

![screenshot91_zps705df479.png](http://i49.photobucket.com/albums/f299/barrio3885/KSP%20mADNESS/screenshot91_zps705df479.png)

May or may not have been my best crash landing ever. And I wasn't even controlling it!

- - - Updated - - -

And by the way, that plane is the [HPI-350 Wasp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114591-Kerbal-Military-Engineering-BD-Armory?p=1986226&viewfull=1#post1986226) from Kerbal Military Engineering. [/shameless plug] And I assure you that yes, production models do in fact come with two full wings.

lol, "Can I come in?"

Here's Val doing the checkup of The Toilet, or perhaps she survived when Jeb destroyed the facility while she was pooping.

It's not really hilarious, but it does give me a chuckle.
